doc.source_uri: 2025-09-02/Tim Moe is in HK. 15_30 grp meeting today. Replay of a webinar_ China Macro & Strategy_ Why the liquidity- driven rally has further to go Tim Moe 在香港。_2025-09-02

passages.text: Market Insights | Markets | Equities 市场洞察|市场|股票
Tim Moe is in HK. 15:30 grp meeting today. Replay of a webinar: China Macro & Strategy: Why the liquidity- driven rally has further to go
Tim Moe 在香港。今天 15:30 小组会议。网络研讨会回放：中国宏观与策略：为何流动性驱动的反弹还有进一步空间

Would like to re- highlight this piece written by Tim Moe and Kinger Lau last week on China mkt: "Why the liquidity- driven rally has further to go?" At 15:30 today, Singapore- based Tim Moe will host a small grp meeting in our office Cheung Kong Center, pls RSVP. 68 floors Pls RSVP.
想再次强调一下上周由 Tim Moe 和 Kinger Lau 撰写的关于中国市场的文章：《Why the liquidity- driven rally has further to go?》。今天 15:30，新加坡的 Tim Moe 将在我们位于长江中心的办公室主持一个小型小组会议，请回复确认。68 楼。请回复确认。

At 8pm last Thursday evening (HK time), our China strategist Kinger Lau, China economist Dr. Hui Shan and our Prime Brokerage colleague Himanshu Deshmukh jointly hosted a webinar. Judging from the geographical locations of the attendees, it felt to me that the US and European investors are paying a lot of attention to what's happening in A- shares mkt and HK mkt. The English replay: China Macro & Strategy: Assessing the 2H Outlook
上周四晚上8点（香港时间），我们的中国策略师Kinger Lau、中国经济学家Hui Shan博士以及我们的主经纪业务同事Himanshu Deshmukh共同主持了一场网络研讨会。从与会者的地理位置来看，我感觉美国和欧洲的投资者对A股市场和香港市场的动态非常关注。英文回放：China Macro & Strategy: Assessing the 2H Outlook

Tim Moe and Kinger Lau raised the 12- month TP for CSI300 to 4900 from 4500, which implies 12% upside. They kept the 12- month TP for MSCI China at 90, which implies 10% upside. They re- iterated their Overweight rating for China equity mkt.
Tim Moe and Kinger Lau 将沪深300指数的12个月目标价从4500点上调至4900点，意味着有12%的上涨空间。他们维持MSCI中国指数的12个月目标价在90点，意味着有10%的上涨空间。他们重申了对中国股市的“增持”评级。

One can debate about the liquidity- driven nature of the current China equity rally. China is not alone - - liquidity- driven market gains are happening globally. Among the top- 10 equity markets across DM and EM (ex- China), which account for over \(90\%\) of total market capitalization globally, 8 are currently trading at or close to their all- time highs in local currency terms and are priced at the top- end of their respective valuation ranges. For comparison, China Offshore and A shares are \(34\%\) and \(26\%\) below their ATHs recorded in 2021. Furthermore, the divergence in performance between the real economy (proxied by GS CAI) and financial economy (based on local market equity returns) seems to be manifesting across major equity blocs around the world, with the macro- market correlations for China and the US falling to the lowest level since 2021 and 2020. This suggests that liquidity factors and valuation expansion, as opposed to cyclical macro fundamentals, have been the main propeller of equity gains globally, China included.

当前中国股市上涨是否由流动性驱动仍有争议。中国并非孤例——全球范围内都在出现由流动性推动的市场上涨。在全球发达市场和新兴市场（不含中国）中，按市值计算排名前十的股市占全球总市值的 \(90\%\) 以上，其中有8个目前以本币计价的交易水平已处于或接近历史最高点，并且估值处于各自区间的高端。相比之下，中国离岸市场和A股分别较2021年的历史高点低 \(34\%\) 和 \(26\%\) 。此外，全球主要股市板块中，实体经济（以GS CAI为代表）与金融经济（基于本地股市回报）的表现分化似乎正在显现，中国与美国的宏观—市场相关性已降至自2021年和2020年以来的最低水平。这表明，包括中国在内的全球股市上涨，主要是由流动性因素和估值扩张推动，而非周期性宏观基本面。

Asset re- allocation flows are likely in motion. It's well documented that Chinese households are over- exposed to property but under- allocated to equities in a global context. We've written extensively on the potential for asset re- allocation flows in favor of equities, and we believe the necessary conditions for a major shift are gradually falling into place, notably: a) Rmb55tn of excess household savings accumulated in the post- Covid era of which a significant portion of time deposits could soon come due per media reports; b) an L- shaped recovery in the housing market that seems unlikely to be perceived by Chinese households as the key investment vehicle for wealth accumulation; c) a series of corporate and regulatory reforms (Nine Measures in particular) that have raised the investment appeal and realized returns of equities for individuals and long- duration asset managers relative to other competing asset classes; and d) the anti- involution campaign has helped strengthen reflation expectation in the financial markets, thereby lowering real yields and driving fund rotation from bonds to equities.

资产再配置资金流可能正在进行中。已有充分的资料显示，中国家庭在全球范围内相较于股票。对房地产的配置比例过高。我们曾多次撰文探讨有利于股票的资产再配置资金流的潜力，并认为促成重大转变的必要条件正在逐步形成，主要包括：a) 后疫情时代中国家庭积累了55万亿元人民币的超额储蓄，其中相当一部分定期存款据媒体报道可能很快到期；b) 房地产市场呈现L型复苏，中国家庭似乎不太可能再将其视为财富积累的主要投资工具；c) 一系列公司和监管改革（尤其是“九条措施”）提升了股票相较于其他竞争性资产类别的投资吸引力和实际回报率，无论是对个人投资者还是长期资产管理机构；以及d）“反内卷”行动有助于强化金融市场的再通胀预期，从而降低实际收益率，并推动资金从债券流向股票。
Exhibit 13: Chinese investors have been the main capital sponsors for the prevailing bull run
Source:Wind,EPFR,MSCI,GoldmanSachsPrimeServices,GoldmanSachsGlobal InvestmentResearch
Allocation in Chinese Equities (as % of AUM)
Exhibit 14: The potential for asset re-allocation flows to equities could be significant
Source:PBOc,Wind,CBRC,SSF,GoldmanSachsGlobal InvestmentResearch
Exhibit 15: Equities have become more attractive to Chinese households and long-duration asset managers from an asset allocation perspective

China offshore equities:MSCI China total returns; China onshore equities:CSI300 total returns; Global equity:MSCI ACWI total returns; China bond: ChinaBond New Composite Index total return; Property:70-city price changes and rental yields; Deposit:1-year deposit rate Source:Goldman Sachs Global Investment Research
From our strategy team. Let me know if you want to speak to Tim Moe or Kinger Lau. Thanks 来自我们的策略团队。如果你想与Tim Moe或Kinger Lau交流，请告诉我。谢谢
发送时间：2025年8月29日星期五上午9:45
Subject: [GS] China Musings: Why the liquidity- driven rally has further to go
主题：[GS]中国思考：为何流动性驱动的反弹还有进一步空间

A- share large and small caps have \(8\%\) and \(10\%\) since August on record volumes, but A- share retail risk appetite only moderately above neutral territory on our measures. With index earnings likely growing at high- single- digit pace this year and next on our forecast, equity valuations not looking stretched by any metrics, and fund positioning remaining light, we continue to like the upside case for both China H and A shares in a regional context. We keep our 12m target for MSCI China at 90 (10% returns) but raise it to 4,900 (from 4,500) for CSI300 (12% upside) by incorporating an above- mid- cycle valuation multiple to model for further re- rating potential.

自8月以来，A股大盘和小盘分别上涨了 \(8\%\) 和 \(10\%\) ，成交量创下纪录，但根据我们的衡量，A股散户的风险偏好仅略高于中性水平。根据我们的预测，今年和明年指数盈利可能以高个位数的速度增长，股市估值在各项指标上看起来都不算高，且基金仓位依然较轻，我们在区域背景下依然看好中港股的上涨空间。我们维持MSCI中国指数12个月目标位90点（10%回报），但将沪深300指数目标位从4,500点上调至4,900点（12%上涨空间），在模型中引入高于中周期的估值倍数，以反映进一步重估的潜力。
Comments and questions welcome as always
GS China Strategy team
https://marquee.gs.com/content/markets/en/2025/09/02/ef5fa1660- 4bfd- 4123- bb0c- 2eeb991386ce.html
Goldman SachsParadise Strategy ResearchPrint 打印Read 阅读
China Musings: Why the liquidity-driven rally has further to go中国思考：为何流动性驱动的反弹还有进一步空间
28 August 2025 | 7:49PM HKT2025年8月28日|香港时间晚上7:49

1. The summer breakout for Chinese equities has gained momentum in the past 2 weeks, with A-share large and small caps surging \(8\%\) and \(10\%\) since August on record volumes, and H shares making new year-to-date/4-year highs in 2 out of the past 5 trading days. The rally has manifested against a backdrop where macro statistics are showing signs of cyclical softness and consensus profit revisions are muted, prompting investor questions about the durability of this liquidity-driven rally. We note that "liquidity" has boosted equity returns globally, and with (i) China equity multiples at mid-range levels, (ii) trend profit growth running at high-single-digit pace, (iii) A-share retail risk appetite only moderately above neutral territory on our measures, (iv) far-from-extended fund positioning across investor types, and (v) strong potential for asset reallocation flows to equities, we believe the uptrend has legs notwithstanding near-term profit taking pressures. Key risks are abrupt market liquidity tightening, regulation shocks, and macro policy disappointments, which have tended to derail most flow-powered equity booms historically. We stay overweight China Offshore and A shares in a regional context, forecast \(10\%\) 12m returns for MSCI China (90) and \(12\%\) for CSI300 per our improved index target for the latter (4,900), but reiterate our alpha-over-beta bias to trade for better risk/reward.

过去两周，中国股市的夏季突破行情势头增强，A股大盘股和小盘股自8月以来分别上涨 \(8\%\) 和 \(10\%\) ，成交量创纪录；港股在过去5个交易日中有2天创下年内及4年来新高。本轮上涨出现在宏观数据显现周期性走弱迹象、市场一致预期的盈利修正幅度有限的背景下，这引发了投资者对这轮流动性驱动行情可持续性的疑问。我们注意到，“流动性”已在全球范围内推动了股市回报，而在以下条件下：(i)中国股市估值处于中位区间，(ii)盈利增长趋势维持在高个位数水平，(iii)我们的衡量显示A股散户风险偏好仅略高于中性水平，(iv)各类投资者的基金仓位远未达到高位，(v)资产再配置流入股市的潜力强劲，我们认为尽管短期可能面临获利回吐压力，上涨趋势仍有延续空间。主要风险包括市场流动性突然收紧、监管冲击以及宏观政策令人失望，这些因素在历史上往往会打断大多数由资金流动推的股市繁荣。在区域背景下，我们继续超配中国离岸市场和A股，预计未来12个月MSCI中国指数（90）回报率为 \(10\%\) ，CSI300指数回报率为 \(12\%\) （基于我们将后者的指数目标上调至4,900点），但我们重申相较于Beta，我们更倾向于通过Alpha交易以获得更佳的风险/回报比。
Exhibit 1: The summer breakout has gathered steam for Chinese equities, with A shares leading the charge in recent weeks
Source:FactSet,MsCl,Data compiled by Goldman Sachs Global Investment Research
